entry.title: lovechan404/ai-playground: AI Playground is lightweight, self-hostable AI chat interface designed for quick experimentation with various AI APIs. No logins, no persistence—just a clean, temporary sandbox where you can test prompts, tweak AI settings, and interact with models in real time.
entry.content: AI Playground is lightweight, self-hostable AI chat interface designed for quick experimentation with various AI APIs. No logins, no persistence—just a clean, temporary sandbox where you can test prompts, tweak AI settings, and interact with models in real time.

entry.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: publicmap/amche-goa: A lightweight and customizable web GIS platform for the state of Goa, India. Designed as a community maintained tool for hyperlocal spatial data exploration and decision making.
entry.content: A lightweight and customizable web GIS platform for the state of Goa, India. Designed as a community maintained tool for hyperlocal spatial data exploration and decision making.

entry.title: rupayn/school_management-api: This project is an Educase India Node.js assignment. It features a lightweight Express.js and Prisma backend with MySQL, offering APIs to add schools and list them by proximity to a user's location. Optimized for serverless deployment.
entry.content: This project is an Educase India Node.js assignment. It features a lightweight Express.js and Prisma backend with MySQL, offering APIs to add schools and list them by proximity to a user's location. Optimized for serverless deployment.

entry.title: RyvelTS/tiny-genai-proxy-ts: A lightweight TypeScript proxy server for the Google Gemini API
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript proxy server for the Google Gemini API

entry.title: cedricpierre/fluentity-core: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.
entry.content: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.

entry.title: AmaanMultani/lite-debounce-js: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟
entry.content: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟

entry.title: Ajairajv/my-vite-app: A modern, lightweight, and performant web application built with Vite and TypeScript, showcasing a responsive user interface with a form UI, deployed seamlessly on Vercel. This project demonstrates proficiency in modern front-end development with a focus on speed and scalability.
entry.content: A modern, lightweight, and performant web application built with Vite and TypeScript, showcasing a responsive user interface with a form UI, deployed seamlessly on Vercel. This project demonstrates proficiency in modern front-end development with a focus on speed and scalability.

entry.title: luanreis28aa/hycom-api: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙
entry.content: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙

entry.title: thegamer49520/timeout-typescript: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨
entry.content: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨

entry.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
entry.content: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀

entry.title: Vlad345345/bs-progressbar: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility
entry.content: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: BAHEKARPRANAV/ButterPop.js: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.
entry.content: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.

entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
